## ParticleSystem class

Particle system class

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ParticleSystem extends ParticleSystem_base implements Drawable 
```
**Extends:** ParticleSystem\_base

**Implements:** [Drawable](doc/markdown/./scene.drawable.md)
